name: Prowl
description: Innate - Prowl: Being in  brush grants Nidalee  10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby  visible enemy  champion.
descriptions: Innate - Prowl: Being in  brush grants Nidalee  10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby  visible enemy  champion.

Innate - Hunt: Hitting nearby  monsters or enemy champions with  Javelin Toss or  Bushwhack marks them as Hunted,  revealing them for 4 seconds and granting Nidalee  10% bonus movement speed for the same duration, increased to 30% when facing a nearby Hunted target. Additionally, Nidalee's first use of  Takedown and  Pounce against Hunted targets are empowered.
The bonus movement speed from Prowl and Hunt can stack, but cannot exceed 30%.

name: Javelin Toss
description: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits, which is increased by 0% − 200% (based on distance traveled).
leveling: Minimum Magic Damage:»70 / 85 / 100 / 115 / 130 (+ 50% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:210 / 255 / 300 / 345 / 390 (+ 150% AP)
levelings: Minimum Magic Damage:»70 / 85 / 100 / 115 / 130 (+ 50% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:210 / 255 / 300 / 345 / 390 (+ 150% AP)
descriptions: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits, which is increased by 0% − 200% (based on distance traveled).

name: Bushwhack
description: Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location, which  stealths and arms after 1.5 seconds and lasts for up to 2 minutes, granting a small area of  sight around it. The next enemy who springs the trap takes magic damage over 4 seconds.
leveling: Magic Damage Per Second:»10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 (+ 5% AP)«Total Magic Damage:40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 (+ 20% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage Per Second:»10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 (+ 5% AP)«Total Magic Damage:40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 (+ 20% AP)
descriptions: Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location, which  stealths and arms after 1.5 seconds and lasts for up to 2 minutes, granting a small area of  sight around it. The next enemy who springs the trap takes magic damage over 4 seconds.

Traps have  6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 hit points from  ranged and 3 hit points from  melee). Up to a maximum of 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on level) traps may be active at once.

name: Primal Surge
description: Active: Nidalee evokes the spirit of the cougar,  healing the target allied champion or herself, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health), and granting them  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Nidalee evokes the spirit of the cougar,  healing the target allied champion or herself, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health), and granting them  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Cougar
description: Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a cougar, gaining  melee attacks with  125 range as well as new abilities.
leveling: Cougar form's abilities rank up when Aspect of the Cougar does
levelings: Cougar form's abilities rank up when  Aspect of the Cougar does
descriptions: Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a cougar, gaining  melee attacks with  125 range as well as new abilities.
Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a human, gaining  ranged attacks with 525  range as well as new abilities.
Triggering  Hunt resets Aspect of the Cougar's  cooldown if Nidalee is in human form.
Nidalee begins with one rank in Aspect of the Cougar and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
